title: Blue essence on PBE
body: So on the PBE we only have 3k rp and 5 be, no other rp will be offered but the be is refreshed every day ?

replies.body: Correct!  Your stipend will refresh around noon each day, but is limited to a smaller amount.  More info on the pbe thread [here](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence)!
thanks you so much riot is hot on the forum for the pbe
